entry.title: Caretakers
entry.summary:
Author: em2mb

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 296,031Chapters: 15/18Kudos: 839

Summary: Now Lydia sees the white room clearly, Stiles sitting cross-legged on the nemeton in his lacrosse jersey, squinting at a chessboard.That’s when Lydia realizes her vantage point makes her Stiles’ opponent — and she has him in check.Her instinct is to push her own king into danger, but Stiles grabs her wrist. “Come on, Lydia,” he says dryly, a smile tugging at the corner of his mouth. “Chess might not be your game, but surely you know that’s against the rules.”Lydia tries to squirm away from him. “But you’ll die,” she insists, his grip tightening so much she’s certain his long fingers will leave bruises.“Say it, Lydia,” Stiles urges. “Checkmate. Checkmate. Checkmate — ”* Five months after the nogitsune tears through Beacon Hills, Stiles' humanity leaves the McCall pack vulnerable. Post-3B.

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,714Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Time-Crossed Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: DancingTearsSuou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,293Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Across time and space, love leaves echoes — and for Dean Winchester, the TARDIS seems to be both a beacon and a curse. When he meets the Tenth Doctor after the fall of Lucifer, it’s not salvation he finds, but a spark that haunts him through every timeline. Each Doctor carries a different version of that spark. But time isn’t linear, and for someone like Dean — caught between timelines and monsters — love is never easy.

entry.title: And Then There Was You
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,538Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 155

Summary: “I’m having a baby,” Derek said simply.Stiles stared. “What?”“I’m having a baby,” he repeated, quieter this time. “Well, not me, obviously. A girl I… met. After Laura died.”Stiles blinked. “Wait - what girl?”~~~~~Derek finds out he's going to be a father and turns to the Stilinski's for help. (Starts during Season 2 of the show)

entry.title: For All I've Done (And All We Never Were)
entry.summary:
Author: brainless_scarecrow

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 120,150Chapters: 39/41Kudos: 1,206

Summary: “You knew I was in love with you,” Stiles snapped, all business.Derek’s entire body tensed. For a second, he looked ahead, eyes wide, and then he lowered his gaze to the floor again, contrite.“You knew. You’ve known for…” Stiles’s throat constricted, cutting him off. “You knew. And you left anyway.”“Do you…” Derek hesitated, licking his lips. “Do you still-?”“Fuck you.”Derek nodded, as if this was fair.Months after the incident with the Nogitsune, a slew of attacks begins anew in Beacon Hills. As Stiles and the pack scramble to find the killer, Derek Hale returns to town.

entry.title: Room 318
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,296Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 180

Summary: Derek pulled the chair closer to the bed and sat down, eyes scanning every detail like he couldn’t decide what to focus on. “What’s going on?”Stiles didn’t answer right away. He looked out the window for a second, his expression tightening, and when he turned back, his voice was quiet.“Bone cancer,” he said. “Osteosarcoma, to be specific. I’m on my first round of chemo. They started it last week.”~~~~Derek returns from Mexico and realizes things have gotten much worse since he left.

entry.title: 4 times Derek touched Stiles, +1 time Stiles touched Derek
entry.summary:
Author: UrNewtmas_ObsessedGirl

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,920Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 26

Summary: Stiles has been pining after Derek since, well a long time. Derek has always been a little oblivious. Stiles thought he had no chance with the wolf until Derek actually started to show interest in him. First as friends, but those touches? Those weren't just friendly. There was a meaning behind those touches. And Derek? He knew very well what he was doing to Stiles with those touches. Making a little game of it, trying to see how far he'd come.But what happens when Stiles has enough of his little game and takes matters into his own hands?

entry.title: Shattered and Bound
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,234Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 204

Summary: After losing Derek and his father to a feral Scott in the aftermath of the Nogitsune, a shattered Stiles kills his former best friend and is left drowning in guilt and grief.Unable to live in a world where everyone he loves is gone, he casts a one way time travel spell meant to rewrite it all - only to wake up years earlier than expected, in a peaceful dimension where he never existed and the Hales are still alive.Haunted by trauma and drawn to a younger, unbroken Derek, Stiles must navigate healing, fate, and love in a world that was never meant to be his.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,400Chapters: 13/17Kudos: 503

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: Bluff
entry.summary:
Author: verydemure

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,576Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 78

Summary: Derek is desperate, his family on the brink of ruin. Ordered by the council to marry before the end of the year, everyone assumes he'll just marry some rich woman and get to creating an heir.They're wrong.-Mischief.Derek thinks that's what Stiles' full Polish name means. It's all he sees as Stiles says, “You know. I think I was wrong on both accounts." Before Derek can respond, Stiles continues, “Will you ask again? Properly.” Stiles glances to the side of the table. To the floor.It's a test.Derek takes his dead mother's ring. Gets down on one knee in front of Stiles, who generously makes room between his legs.“Will you marry me?”“Yes.”

entry.title: The Hunt for the Argent Codex
entry.summary:
Author: Ticket_to_Insanity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,864Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Hunters across the globe are seeking the Argent Codex - a mythical book said to hold spells, maps, and rituals that can tip the supernatural balance. After a mysterious group attacks Scott and steals a page from Deaton's collection, Stiles is forced to team up with Derek, who recently returned to Beacon Hills tracking the same cult.The two set off on a road trip across old supernatural sites to stop the cult from reassembling the Codex. Between magical threats, near-death experiences, and cramped motel rooms, their antagonism starts giving way to something hotter... and far more dangerous.

entry.title: when everything fell apart (and got put back together)
entry.summary:
Author: stayinginstiles

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,156Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 52

Summary: It wasn't Stiles' fault that the plan fell apart. The plan that he painstakingly put together instead of getting a good night's rest, which Stiles planned on doing as soon as they got out of the chaotic mess that his pups turned this plan into.ORWhen faeries descend on Beacon Hills to sow chaos, Stiles comes up with a plan to send them packing. Only, things don't go the way they're supposed to and Derek takes care of his Spark in the aftermath.
